nodes.title: SWE Portfolio Page
nodes.prompt: Kind: page. What: A portfolio page showcasing a software engineer's skills, projects, and contact information. How: Designed with a responsive layout and modern styling using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Properties: responsive, SEO-friendly, accessible.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: First section of the page showcasing the name, title, and call-to-action (CTA). How: Full-screen layout with background image or gradient, and prominent text. Properties: centered, responsive, engaging.

nodes.title: About Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: A section introducing the software engineer and describing their background. How: Two-column layout with profile image and text description. Properties: modern layout, responsive, accessible.

nodes.title: Projects Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: A section showcasing key projects with links to detailed descriptions or live demos. How: Grid layout with cards representing individual projects. Properties: structured, visually appealing, responsive.

nodes.title: Contact Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: A section for users to reach out via a contact form or email. How: Layout with an input form and contact details. Properties: simple, accessible, responsive.

nodes.title: Hero Title
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: The main title text of the hero section, typically the name of the software engineer. How: Large, bold typography. Properties: prominent, readable, accessible.

nodes.title: Hero Subtitle
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Additional text that supports the hero title, describing the engineer's job/expertise. How: Smaller, secondary typography. Properties: readable, supportive.

nodes.title: Call-to-Action Button
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: A button to direct the user to a key action, such as viewing projects. How: Styled button with hover effects and responsive behavior. Properties: clickable, engaging.

nodes.title: Profile Image
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: A profile picture or avatar of the software engineer. How: Circular or square image with a border and alt text. Properties: accessible, SEO-friendly.

nodes.title: About Text
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: A textual description of the software engineer's skills and background. How: Responsive typography with proper spacing. Properties: readable, accessible.

nodes.title: Project Card
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Card for showcasing a single project, with image, title, and links. How: Styled card with hover effects and responsive grid layout. Properties: visually appealing, interactive.

nodes.title: Contact Form
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Input form for users to send messages. How: Form with inputs for name, email, and message field, styled with Tailwind CSS for spacing and responsiveness. Properties: accessible, responsive.

nodes.title: Contact Information
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Details about how users can reach out, including email or social links. How: List or small section styled for clarity. Properties: clean, comprehensive.
